**Request for Standing Offer: Vehicle Transport Services**

**Reference Number:** 202101766/A

**Publication Date:** 2023-05-30

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-23T15:00:00

**Introduction:**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), North West Region (NWR) Fleet Management, is soliciting Standing Offers for the transportation of various motor vehicles to RCMP Post Garage locations within the Provinces of Alberta, Saskatchewan, Manitoba, and Quebec, on an "as requested" basis.

**Contract Details:**

* Contract period: 2 years with the option to extend for up to 3 additional one-year periods
* Anticipated start date: at contract award
* Successful Offeror must ensure that all personnel working on-site hold a valid Facility Access with Escort (FA2) security clearance issued by RCMP Departmental Security Section

**Basis of Selection:**

Offers must comply with the requirements of the Request for Standing Offers to be declared responsive. The responsive offer with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for issuance of a Standing Offer.

**Selection Criteria:**
The selected tender will be based on the lowest evaluated price, under the framework of a Request for Standing Offers. All tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.

**Procurement Details:**

* Procuring Office: Royal Canadian Mounted Police, Procurement and Contracting, 5th Floor, 10065 Jasper Ave NW, Edmonton, Alberta, T5J 3B1
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: Canada

**Notice and Attachments:**

The Solicitation Document and associated documents are available for download from the Canada Buys website (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).
All amendments to the Solicitation Document will be posted on the Canada Buys website.

**Indigenous Procurement:**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police encourages participation from Indigenous businesses. The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for identifying Indigenous business capacity.

Contact Information:

* Andrew Johnson, Procurement Officer
* Email: andrew.johnson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
* Phone: (587) 338-6198

**Tender Requirements:**

* Tenders must be submitted in either English or French
